short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for a highlighted word on selected websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing experience with our unique Chrome extension that allows you to search highlighted text on your favorite websites. After installing, click on the extension icon to open a window where you can add your preferred websites to the 'list of sites'. Once these sites are added, simply highlight a selection of text on any webpage, right-click, and choose the 'Search on' option. This will provide a dropdown of your 'list of sites' for you to select from. Your selected text is then instantly searched on the website of your choosing. This tool not only saves time but also allows for quick cross-referencing and efficient information gathering. Install our extension today to streamline your online research process.
